attributes.comment:
I'm commenting on behalf of all of those who are in the process of foriegn
adoption now and in the future. The U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services
department is proposing a steep increase in adoption fees (per docket
#USCIS-2006-0044). I believe that a 66% increase of these fees is unfair and
unjust. I'm commenting here to support that these fees NOT be raised at all or
by a much lesser amount. Adoption is already extremely expensive and such a
steep raise in fees would keep more families from adopting who want and deserve
to be parents. It would also hurt the children of impoverished countries who
deserve a chance at a better life. I hope that all of our comments here matter
and make a difference.

Comment on FR Doc #
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Pat Obst
